response.overview: Journalist Kevin Magee nvestigates the story of Ludwig Mühlhausen, a member of the Nazi party and a scholar of Irish. Mühlhausen spent six weeks in the small Gaeltacht town of Teilann, in South Tírconaill in 1937, collecting folklore and improving his Irish but that was not the only work he was doing there. As Kevin shows, he was a Nazi spy, gathering information and passing it on to the Third Reich.
response.tagline: Investigative journalist Kevin Magee uncovers the work of Nazi party member and Irish scholar Dr. Ludwig Mühlhausen.
response.title: Nazi sa Ghaeltacht
